--address=[localhost].Description: Addresses to listen on (comma separated). Only accepts IP addresses or localhost as a value. When localhost is supplied, kubectl will try to bind on both 127.0.0.1 and ::1 and will fail if neither of these addresses are available to bind.

--pod-running-timeout=1m0s.Description: The length of time (like 5s, 2m, or 3h, higher than zero) to wait until at least one pod is running
